pages.text: $(bgreen)Potato Mine$() is considered so lazy that it leaves everything to the last minute. Actually, it's too busy thinking about his investment strategy.$(br)$(byellow)Sun Cost$() : $(l)25$()$(br)$(bblue)Recharge$() : $(l)Little Slow$()$(br)$(l)Features$() : It is a $(l)close-kill$() plant, which will make a $(bred)explosion damage$() to all enemies in $(l)3 * 3$() area when enemy is close to it.$(bred)It need 12 seconds to arm themselves$().
$(bgreen)Plant Food :$() Shoot several potato mines to surrounding.
